content: Formulate a paragraph describing emotions with every word starting with the letter "e".

Elegant elephants epitomize emotional equilibrium, evoking empathy in enthusiasts. Enigmatic expressions expose their euphoric or envious states, eliciting emotional engagement from onlookers. Each eye movement encapsulates a spectrum of emotions, from elation to ennui. Encountering such emotional exhibitions educates us about the essence of empathy and the extensive range of feelings that exist beyond our own experiences.
